languages.text: "Вы имеете в виду Ирлиэт, нашу главную союзницу в борьбе с бунтовщиками. Я закрыла глаза на ее ужасные мутации ввиду неоспоримой пользы, которую она приносит. Видите ли, Ирлиэт происходит из вырождающегося местного рода и знает Янус как свои пять пальцев, поэтому она не раз подсказывала нам места, где могут находиться стачки и тайные склады. Хотя, признаться, порой мне хочется отослать ее из поместья — каждый раз, когда мы разговариваем, мне становится не по себе от ее противоестественности. Столь неженственное, тощее тело, да еще и такого роста..."

"You must be referring to Yrliet, our chief ally in the struggle against the rebels. I have turned a blind eye to her horrific mutations given the undoubted advantages she brings. You see, Yrliet comes from the local degenerate stock of this world and knows Janus like the back of her hand, so she has provided several leads as to where we can find bases and secret storehouses. Although I admit that at times I am tempted to send her away from the estate — her unnaturalness means that speaking with her always leaves me feeling uneasy. Such a gaunt, unfeminine figure, and so tall..."
languages.original_text: "Вы имеете в виду Ирлиэт, нашу главную союзницу в борьбе с бунтовщиками. Я закрыла глаза на ее ужасные мутации ввиду неоспоримой пользы, которую она приносит. Видите ли, Ирлиэт происходит из вырождающегося местного рода и знает Янус как свои пять пальцев, поэтому она не раз подсказывала нам места, где могут находиться стачки и тайные склады. Хотя, признаться, порой мне хочется отослать ее из поместья — каждый раз, когда мы разговариваем, мне становится не по себе от ее противоестественности. Столь неженственное, тощее тело, да еще и такого роста..."

Although I admit that at times I am tempted to send her away from the estate — her unnaturalness means that speaking with her always leaves me feeling uneasy. Such a gaunt, unfeminine figure, and so tall..."

languages.text: “您指的一定是伊莉耶特，她是我们与叛军斗争的有力盟友。鉴于她为我们带来了毋庸置疑的优势，我选择对她可怕的变异视而不见。如您所见，伊莉耶特出身于这个世界的劣化人类之中。她对加努斯了如指掌，为我们提供了几条线索，告诉我们可以去哪里找到叛军的基地与秘密仓库。不过，我得承认，有时候我真的很想把她赶出我的庄园。她实在是太古怪了，和她说话总是让我感到不安。而且她的身材这么贫瘠，一点女人味都没有，还长得这么高……”
languages.original_text: "You must be referring to Yrliet, our chief ally in the struggle against the rebels. I have turned a blind eye to her horrific mutations given the undoubted advantages she brings. You see, Yrliet comes from the local degenerate stock of this world and knows Janus like the back of her hand, so she has provided several leads as to where we can find bases and secret storehouses. Although I admit that at times I am tempted to send her away from the estate — her unnaturalness means that speaking with her always leaves me feeling uneasy. Such a gaunt, unfeminine figure, and so tall..."

traits.locale_text: “您指的一定是伊莉耶特，她是我们与叛军斗争的有力盟友。鉴于她为我们带来了毋庸置疑的优势，我选择对她可怕的变异视而不见。如您所见，伊莉耶特出身于这个世界的劣化人类之中。她对加努斯了如指掌，为我们提供了几条线索，告诉我们可以去哪里找到叛军的基地与秘密仓库。不过，我得承认，有时候我真的很想把她赶出我的庄园。她实在是太古怪了，和她说话总是让我感到不安。而且她的身材这么贫瘠，一点女人味都没有，还长得这么高……”

languages.text: «Debe de referirse a Yrliet, nuestra principal aliada en la lucha contra los rebeldes. He decidido hacer la vista gorda a sus espantosas mutaciones a raíz de las ventajas que proporcionan sus servicios. Verá, Yrliet proviene de la degenerada gente de este mundo y conoce Janus como la palma de su mano, por lo que ha proporcionado pistas sobre dónde encontrar bases y almacenes secretos. Debo admitir que en ocasiones siento ganas de expulsarla de la finca. Su carácter antinatural hace que hablar con ella me incomode. Es flaca, nada femenina y demasiado alta...».
languages.original_text: "You must be referring to Yrliet, our chief ally in the struggle against the rebels. I have turned a blind eye to her horrific mutations given the undoubted advantages she brings. You see, Yrliet comes from the local degenerate stock of this world and knows Janus like the back of her hand, so she has provided several leads as to where we can find bases and secret storehouses. Although I admit that at times I am tempted to send her away from the estate — her unnaturalness means that speaking with her always leaves me feeling uneasy. Such a gaunt, unfeminine figure, and so tall..."

traits.locale_text: «Debe de referirse a Yrliet, nuestra principal aliada en la lucha contra los rebeldes. He decidido hacer la vista gorda a sus espantosas mutaciones a raíz de las ventajas que proporcionan sus servicios. Verá, Yrliet proviene de la degenerada gente de este mundo y conoce Janus como la palma de su mano, por lo que ha proporcionado pistas sobre dónde encontrar bases y almacenes secretos. Debo admitir que en ocasiones siento ganas de expulsarla de la finca. Su carácter antinatural hace que hablar con ella me incomode. Es flaca, nada femenina y demasiado alta...».

languages.text: 「ユリエットのことですね。反乱軍との闘いで大いに働いてくれている協力者です。恐ろしい突然変異を遂げていますが、ユリエットの働きは間違いなく大きいものですから、そこには目をつむっています。ご覧のとおり、ユリエットはこの星由来の堕落者の生まれです。ヤヌスを熟知していますから、基地や秘密の倉庫の場所を見つけられるように情報提供を受けているのです。とは言っても、時には屋敷から追い出したくなるときもあります。不気味なことに、ユリエットと話すといつも不快になるのです。あんな痩せこけて女性らしさを失った身体、異様な長身…」
languages.original_text: "You must be referring to Yrliet, our chief ally in the struggle against the rebels. I have turned a blind eye to her horrific mutations given the undoubted advantages she brings. You see, Yrliet comes from the local degenerate stock of this world and knows Janus like the back of her hand, so she has provided several leads as to where we can find bases and secret storehouses. Although I admit that at times I am tempted to send her away from the estate — her unnaturalness means that speaking with her always leaves me feeling uneasy. Such a gaunt, unfeminine figure, and so tall..."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットのことですね。反乱軍との闘いで大いに働いてくれている協力者です。恐ろしい突然変異を遂げていますが、ユリエットの働きは間違いなく大きいものですから、そこには目をつむっています。ご覧のとおり、ユリエットはこの星由来の堕落者の生まれです。ヤヌスを熟知していますから、基地や秘密の倉庫の場所を見つけられるように情報提供を受けているのです。とは言っても、時には屋敷から追い出したくなるときもあります。不気味なことに、ユリエットと話すといつも不快になるのです。あんな痩せこけて女性らしさを失った身体、異様な長身…」

languages.text: "Ihr meint bestimmt Yrliet, unsere Hauptverbündete im Kampf gegen die Rebellen. Ich sehe über ihre fürchterlichen Mutationen hinweg, angesichts der unzweifelhaften Vorteile, die sie bringt. Ihr müsst wissen, Yrliet stammt aus dem degenerierten Bestand dieser Welt und kennt Janus wie ihre Westentasche. Sie hat uns schon mehrfach Hinweise gegeben, wo wir Basen und geheime Lagerhäuser finden können. Ich gebe allerdings zu, dass ich hin und wieder versucht bin, sie wegzuschicken – ihre Unnatürlichkeit löst bei Gesprächen immer ein unangenehmes Gefühl in mir aus. Diese schauerliche, unweibliche Figur, und so groß ..."
languages.original_text: "You must be referring to Yrliet, our chief ally in the struggle against the rebels. I have turned a blind eye to her horrific mutations given the undoubted advantages she brings. You see, Yrliet comes from the local degenerate stock of this world and knows Janus like the back of her hand, so she has provided several leads as to where we can find bases and secret storehouses. Although I admit that at times I am tempted to send her away from the estate — her unnaturalness means that speaking with her always leaves me feeling uneasy. Such a gaunt, unfeminine figure, and so tall..."

Ich sehe über ihre fürchterlichen Mutationen hinweg, angesichts der unzweifelhaften Vorteile, die sie bringt. Sie hat uns schon mehrfach Hinweise gegeben, wo wir Basen und geheime Lagerhäuser finden können. Ich gebe allerdings zu, dass ich hin und wieder versucht bin, sie wegzuschicken – ihre Unnatürlichkeit löst bei Gesprächen immer ein unangenehmes Gefühl in mir aus. Diese schauerliche, unweibliche Figur, und so groß ..."

languages.text: « Vous devez parler d'Yrliet, notre principale alliée dans la lutte contre les rebelles. C'est un tel atout que j'ai décidé de fermer les yeux sur ses affreuses mutations. Yrliet est issue d'une souche locale tombée en dégénérescence, voyez-vous. Elle connaît Janus comme sa poche et nous a donné plusieurs pistes qui nous ont permis de trouver des bases et des entrepôts secrets. J'avoue toutefois que je suis parfois tentée de la renvoyer du domaine, car son apparence si anormale me met toujours mal à l'aise quand je lui parle. Ce corps trop longiligne manque cruellement de féminité... »
languages.original_text: "You must be referring to Yrliet, our chief ally in the struggle against the rebels. I have turned a blind eye to her horrific mutations given the undoubted advantages she brings. You see, Yrliet comes from the local degenerate stock of this world and knows Janus like the back of her hand, so she has provided several leads as to where we can find bases and secret storehouses. Although I admit that at times I am tempted to send her away from the estate — her unnaturalness means that speaking with her always leaves me feeling uneasy. Such a gaunt, unfeminine figure, and so tall..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez parler d'Yrliet, notre principale alliée dans la lutte contre les rebelles. C'est un tel atout que j'ai décidé de fermer les yeux sur ses affreuses mutations. Yrliet est issue d'une souche locale tombée en dégénérescence, voyez-vous. Elle connaît Janus comme sa poche et nous a donné plusieurs pistes qui nous ont permis de trouver des bases et des entrepôts secrets. J'avoue toutefois que je suis parfois tentée de la renvoyer du domaine, car son apparence si anormale me met toujours mal à l'aise quand je lui parle. Ce corps trop longiligne manque cruellement de féminité... »

languages.text: "İsyancılara karşı mücadeledeki baş müttefikimiz Yrliet'ten bahsediyorsunuz sanırım. Sağladığı su götürmez faydaları göz önüne alarak korkunç mutasyonlarına göz yumuyorum. Yrliet, bu dünyada yaşayan sapkın cinse mensup ve Janus'u avucunun içi gibi biliyor. Bize üsleri ve gizli depoları nerede bulabileceğimize dair birkaç ipucu verdi. Gerçi itiraf edeyim, zaman zaman kendisini konaktan atasım geliyor. Gayritabiiliği yüzünden ne zaman konuşsak geriliyorum. Cılızlığı, kadınsı olmayan duruşu, aşırı uzun boyu..."
languages.original_text: "You must be referring to Yrliet, our chief ally in the struggle against the rebels. I have turned a blind eye to her horrific mutations given the undoubted advantages she brings. You see, Yrliet comes from the local degenerate stock of this world and knows Janus like the back of her hand, so she has provided several leads as to where we can find bases and secret storehouses. Although I admit that at times I am tempted to send her away from the estate — her unnaturalness means that speaking with her always leaves me feeling uneasy. Such a gaunt, unfeminine figure, and so tall..."

traits.locale_text: "İsyancılara karşı mücadeledeki başmüttefikimiz Yrliet'ten bahsediyorsunuz sanırım. Sağladığı su götürmez faydaları göz önüne alarak korkunç mutasyonlarına göz yumuyorum. Şöyle ki Yrliet, bu dünyanın yozlaşmış halkına mensup ve Janus'u avucunun içi gibi biliyor. Bize üsleri ve gizli depoları nerede bulabileceğimize dair birkaç ipucu verdi. İtiraf edeyim, zaman zaman kendisini malikâneden atasım geliyor. Gayritabiiliği yüzünden ne zaman konuşsak geriliyorum. Cılız, kadınsı olmayan bir duruşu, uzun boyu..."
